message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/SEALSTestData 

<rdf:Description rdf:about="
http://www.seals-project.eu/alignment/conference#cmt-source
">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="
http://www.seals-project.eu/ontologies/SEALSMetadata.owl#DataItem
" />
    <seals:isLocatedAt>./ont/cmt.owl</seals:isLocatedAt>
    <seals:hasComponentType>source</seals:hasComponentType>
    <dc:identifier>cmt-source</dc:identifier> 
</rdf:Description>

<rdf:Description rdf:about="
http://www.seals-project.eu/alignment/conference#conference-target
">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="
http://www.seals-project.eu/ontologies/SEALSMetadata.owl#DataItem
" />
    <seals:isLocatedAt>./ont/conference.owl</seals:isLocatedAt>
    <seals:hasComponentType>target</seals:hasComponentType>
    <dc:identifier>conference-target</dc:identifier> 
</rdf:Description>

<rdf:Description rdf:about="
http://www.seals-project.eu/alignment/conference#cmt-conference-ref
">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="
http://www.seals-project.eu/ontologies/SEALSMetadata.owl#DataItem
" />
    <seals:isLocatedAt>./ref/cmt-conference.rdf</seals:isLocatedAt>
    <seals:hasComponentType>reference</seals:hasComponentType>
    <dc:identifier>cmt-conference-ref</dc:identifier> 
</rdf:Description>
First we describe the suite with the subject conference:ConferenceSuite of type seals:Suite and define the suite items associated with the suite using the property seals:hasSuiteItem and add a statement with this property for each suite item. In this case we only have a single suite item with the subject conference:cmt-conference of type seals:SuiteItem. The suite item has a dc:identifier property defining the name of the suite items, which we later use for retrieval of the associated data items.
Associated with this suite item are three data items, defined by the seals:hasDataItem statements, in particular, conference:cmt-source, conference:conference-target and conference:cmt-conference-ref. Each of these data items are described separately. In the metadata we define that the data items are of type seals:DataItem. Furthermore, we give the location as a path relative to the top level within the ZIP file using the seals:isLocatedAt property. With the seals:hasComponentType we give the data item a component type, with which we can later refer to and access the data item (or component). Similar to the suite item, the dc:identifier statement has the purpose to name the data item, which allows us to later access the data item.
Accessing the Suite
Retrieve the suite metadata:
http://seals.sti2.at/tdrs-web/testdata/persistent/Conference+Testsuite/2010/suite/
Retrieve the source ontology of test case cmt-conference:
http://seals.sti2.at/tdrs-web/testdata/persistent/Conference+Testsuite/2010/suite/cmt-conference/component/source/
Retrieve the target ontology of test case cmt-conference:
http://seals.sti2.at/tdrs-web/testdata/persistent/Conference+Testsuite/2010/suite/cmt-conference/component/target/
Retrieve the reference alignment of test case cmt-conference:
http://seals.sti2.at/tdrs-web/testdata/persistent/Conference+Testsuite/2010/suite/cmt-conference/component/reference/
Retrieve the file cmt-source of test case cmt-conference:
http://seals.sti2.at/tdrs-web/testdata/persistent/Conference+Testsuite/2010/suite/cmt-conference/item/cmt-source/
Retrieve the file cmt-target of test case cmt-conference:
http://seals.sti2.at/tdrs-web/testdata/persistent/Conference+Testsuite/2010/suite/cmt-conference/item/cmt-target/
Retrieve the file cmt-conference-ref of test case cmt-conference:
http://seals.sti2.at/tdrs-web/testdata/persistent/Conference+Testsuite/2010/suite/cmt-conference/item/cmt-conference-ref/
As you can see, the dc:identifier value of the suite item conference:cmt-conference is used to access the items and components associated with it. As we have defined a component type for all three data items of conference:cmt-conference, we can access them via the
component
resource, using the value of the seals:hasComponentType property. However, we can still access the data items over the
item
resource using the dc:identifier value of the data items. Generally speaking, the following URL schemes are used to access the suite metadata and the data items:
Retrieve the suite metadata:
http://seals.sti2.at/tdrs-web/testdata/persistent/
[collection name]/[version number]/suite/
Retrieve a component:
http://seals.sti2.at/tdrs-web/testdata/persistent/
[collection name]/[version number]/suite/[suite item identifier]/component/[component type]/
Retrieve a data item:
http://seals.sti2.at/tdrs-web/testdata/persistent/
[collection name]/[version number]/suite/[suite item identifier]/item/[item identifier]/
speaker: SYSTEM
